sentences.sentence: From the ground unto above the door were cherubims and palm trees made, and on the wall of the temple.
sentences.translation: 从地至门以上，都有基路伯和棕树。殿墙就是这样。

sentences.sentence: Now the cherubims stood on the right side of the house, when the man went in; and the cloud filled the inner court.
sentences.translation: 那人进去的时候，基路伯站在殿的右边，云彩充满了内院。

sentences.sentence: And he made a vail of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen: with cherubims made he it of cunning work.
sentences.translation: 36：35他用蓝色，紫色，朱红色线，和捻的细麻织幔子，以巧匠的手工绣上基路伯。
